plot: Widowmaker is the story of an assassin who has made a living with a gun and a lack of conscience...until now. Assigned a woman with a child, he hesitates and questions the job as well as the people who've hired him.
title: Widowmaker
plot_es: Widowmaker is the story of an assassin who has made a living with a gun and a lack of conscience...until now. Assigned a woman with a child, he hesitates and questions the job as well as the people who've hired him.
